data.name: Zone B Korosu
data.detailed_description:
Zone B Korosu is a story-driven 2D action platforming game.

Your mundane day-to-day life is about to disappear forever when a world-shattering virus is released, turning average people into monsters.
But you predicted this. You are ready.

Run, jump, shoot, and dodge your way from ground zero of Test Zone B to safety.
Click and search your environment for clues to unlocking the mystery.

Key features:
- Run or fight? Battle zombie hordes and monsters. Face them head-on, or play defensively.
- Search interactive environments for clues about the origins of the disaster and search for a cure. If you see something unusual, check it out!
- Shifting moods. Experience moments of calm, tension, and excitement, as the scenario unfolds around you
- Bring your allies to safety
- Expected playtime: ~1-2hrs

This game is for you if:
- You loved the SNES-era of games
- You enjoy 2D platforming
- You enjoy Point-and-Click adventures
- You love a good story


Planned update roadmap:

Spring 2022:
- initial release

Summer 2022:
- controller support
- graphical and audio updates
- level extensions

Fall 2022:
- Arcade mode: challenge stages separate from the main story
- Survival mode: extra-hard challenge if story mode is too easy

2023:
- Chapter 1 co-op mode
- Chapter 2 campaign

2024:
- Chapter 3 campaign (finale)

data.short_description: Your normal life is over. Zone B Korosu is a survival story 2D platforming game set in the modern day. Run, jump, shoot, and dodge your way from ground zero of Test Zone B to safety. Click and search your environment for any clues to unlocking the mystery.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard and Mouse
